content:
Subject: Request for Workflow Model Information

Dear [Coworker's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to inquire about the workflow model that we have been working on. I am in the process of preparing a report and I would like to have the most up-to-date information about the model.

Could you please provide me with the latest version of the workflow diagram and any relevant documentation or notes about any updates or changes made to the model? I would greatly appreciate it if you could send this over to me by end of day tomorrow, so I can include it in my report.

Thank you for your help and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
